verses.verse: O give thanks<WH3034> unto the LORD;<WH3068> for<WH3588> he is good:<WH2896> because<WH3588> his mercy<WH2617> endureth forever.<WH5769>
Let Israel<WH3478> now<WH4994> say,<WH559> that<WH3588> his mercy<WH2617> endureth forever.<WH5769>
Let the house<WH1004> of Aaron<WH175> now<WH4994> say,<WH559> that<WH3588> his mercy<WH2617> endureth forever.<WH5769>
Let them now<WH4994> that fear<WH3373> the LORD<WH3068> say,<WH559> that<WH3588> his mercy<WH2617> endureth forever.<WH5769>
I called upon<WH7121> the LORD<WH3050> in<WH4480> distress:<WH4712> the LORD<WH3050> answered<WH6030> me, and set me in a large place.<WH4800>
The LORD<WH3068> is on my side; I will not<WH3808> fear:<WH3372> what<WH4100> can man<WH120> do<WH6213> unto me?
The LORD<WH3068> taketh my part with them that help<WH5826> me: therefore shall I<WH589> see<WH7200> my desire upon them that hate<WH8130> me.
It is better<WH2896> to trust<WH2620> in the LORD<WH3068> than to put confidence<WH4480> <WH982> in man.<WH120>
It is better<WH2896> to trust<WH2620> in the LORD<WH3068> than to put confidence<WH4480> <WH982> in princes.<WH5081>
All <WH3605> nations<WH1471> compassed me about:<WH5437> but in the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068> will I destroy<WH4135> them.
They compassed me about;<WH5437> yea,<WH1571> they compassed me about:<WH5437> but in the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068> I will destroy<WH4135> them.
They compassed me about<WH5437> like bees;<WH1682> they are quenched<WH1846> as the fire<WH784> of thorns:<WH6975> for in the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068> I will destroy<WH4135> them.
Thou hast thrust sore<WH1760> <WH1760> at me that I might fall:<WH5307> but the LORD<WH3068> helped<WH5826> me.
The LORD<WH3050> is my strength<WH5797> and song,<WH2176> and is become<WH1961> my salvation.<WH3444>
The voice<WH6963> of rejoicing<WH7440> and salvation<WH3444> is in the tabernacles<WH168> of the righteous:<WH6662> the right hand<WH3225> of the LORD<WH3068> doeth<WH6213> valiantly.<WH2428>
The right hand<WH3225> of the LORD<WH3068> is exalted:<WH7311> the right hand<WH3225> of the LORD<WH3068> doeth<WH6213> valiantly.<WH2428>
I shall not<WH3808> die,<WH4191> but<WH3588> live,<WH2421> and declare<WH5608> the works<WH4639> of the LORD.<WH3050>
The LORD<WH3050> hath chastened me sore:<WH3256> <WH3256> but he hath not<WH3808> given me over<WH5414> unto death.<WH4194>
Open <WH6605> to me the gates<WH8179> of righteousness:<WH6664> I will go<WH935> into them, and I will praise<WH3034> the LORD: <WH3050>
This <WH2088> gate<WH8179> of the LORD,<WH3068> into which the righteous<WH6662> shall enter.<WH935>
I will praise<WH3034> thee: for<WH3588> thou hast heard<WH6030> me, and art become<WH1961> my salvation.<WH3444>
The stone<WH68> which the builders<WH1129> refused<WH3988> is become<WH1961> the head<WH7218> stone of the corner.<WH6438>
This <WH2063> is<WH1961> the LORD's<WH3068> doing;<WH4480> <WH854> it<WH1931> is marvelous<WH6381> in our eyes.<WH5869>
This <WH2088> is the day<WH3117> which the LORD<WH3068> hath made;<WH6213> we will rejoice<WH1523> and be glad<WH8055> in it.
Save <WH3467> now,<WH4994> I beseech<WH577> thee, O LORD:<WH3068> O LORD,<WH3068> I beseech<WH577> thee, send now<WH4994> prosperity.<WH6743>
Blessed <WH1288> be he that cometh<WH935> in the name<WH8034> of the LORD:<WH3068> we have blessed<WH1288> you out of the house<WH4480> <WH1004> of the LORD.<WH3068>
God <WH410> is the LORD,<WH3068> which hath showed us light:<WH215> bind<WH631> the sacrifice<WH2282> with cords,<WH5688> even unto<WH5704> the horns<WH7161> of the altar.<WH4196>
Thou <WH859> art my God,<WH410> and I will praise<WH3034> thee: thou art my God,<WH430> I will exalt<WH7311> thee.
O give thanks<WH3034> unto the LORD;<WH3068> for<WH3588> he is good:<WH2896> for<WH3588> his mercy<WH2617> endureth forever.<WH5769>
